kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF DROPPED FLOWS
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of flows dropped per session profile when the maximum flow limit per PDN connection or node is reached.The maximum number of flows per node is set through the node-max-flows parameter in the general service awareness configuration.The maximum number of flows a PDN connection can maintain is set through the session-max-flows parameter in the session profile configuration. UPDATED: Updated each time a flow is dropped due to the maximum flow limit per PDN connection or node being reached.
